title: It's Bill Clinton's turn to give testimony on Epstein. See age, photos
shortDescription: Former president Bill Clinton will sit for testimony on Jeffrey Epstein on Feb. 27. How many times do we know he flew on Epstein's plane? What to know

title: Bill Clinton faces Epstein questions in House inquiry
shortDescription: Bill Clinton told a House panel he 'did nothing wrong' with accused sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein despite numerous mentions in federal files.

title: Warnock says FBI raid was 'pretext' for Trump interference in midterms
shortDescription: Georgia Senator Raphael Warnock said in a spotlight hearing that the FBI raids in Fulton County were a "pretext" for Trump's interference in midterms.

title: Trump tanks in new poll as Vance and Newsom take 2028 lead
shortDescription: President Trump's disapproval rating climbs to 55%, while Gavin Newsom and JD Vance take early leads in 2028 race, new Emerson College poll shows.

title: Bill Gates apologized and Larry Summers forced to resign this week | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Following the high-profile arrests of Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and Pete Mandelson, both Hilary and Bill Clinton are now testifying to Congress.

title: Christian nationalism in the State of the Union? Trump's speech unpacked
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s State of the Union address included a continued push to boost the presence of religion in American public life.

title: DOJ will probe reports of missing Epstein files about Trump accuser
shortDescription: Three 2019 FBI interview summaries with a woman who had accused President Trump of sexually assaulting her are missing from the 'Epstein Files.'

title: Mamdani gets Trump to release Columbia student in immigration detention
shortDescription: Mamdani’s public schedule, released late Feb. 25, didn’t include any public events. Mamdani wasn’t on the White House’s official schedule.

title: US judge won't block ongoing Trump White House ballroom construction
shortDescription: Judge Richard J. Leon's ruling came after the National Trust for Historic Preservation filed a lawsuit against Trump and several federal agencies.

title: What did Trump say about US women's hockey team White House invite?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called the U.S. men's hockey team after they won the Olympic gold against Canada. His joke about the women's team went viral.
